metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31651 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In SoX 14.4.2, there is an assertion failure in rate_init in rate.c in libsox.a.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31651` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsox-fmt-all - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.2
libsox-fmt-alsa - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.2
libsox-fmt-ao - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.2
libsox-fmt-base - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.2
libsox-fmt-mp3 - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.2
libsox-fmt-oss - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.2
libsox-fmt-pulse - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.2
libsox3 - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.2
sox - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.2').
